full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,NYON MONGS DUG GSUM 'DUL BA'I MAN NGAG YID KYI MUN SEL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012B (CES PA 'DI NI SNAR THANG BA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG PHUN TSOGS KYIS NYON MONGS PA DUG GSUM GYI GNYEN PO BSTEN TSUL SHIN TU GSAL ZHING GO SLA  BA ZHIG DGOS ZHES YANG DANG YANG DU NAN CHEN POS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, ,DGE SLONG YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BKRA SHIS BSAM GTAN GLING SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG THUB PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE MI NUB PA'I RGYAL MTSAN DU GYUR CIG , ,,)
